 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֫בֶן‎</span> **noun masculine**<sup>[[Exod.5.16|Exod 5:16]]</sup> ==straw== (√ unknown; [[BDB#Ges|Ges]] and others compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בנה‎</span> (compare [[BDB#Thes|Thes]]<sup>1492</sup>), but see [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 138</sup>; Late Hebrew = Biblical Hebrew; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***tibnu;***</u></abbr> Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎תִּיבְנָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, whence Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> as loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>124</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ת‎</span> [[Gen.24.25|Gen 24:25]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֶּ֑בֶן‎</span> [[Exod.5.10|Exod 5:10]] +; — ***straw***, i.e. straw threshed fine: chaff [[Jer.23.28|Jer 23:28]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּר‎</span>), blown by wind [[Job.21.28|Job 21:28]] (in simile; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֹץ‎</span>), yielding [[Job.41.19|Job 41:19]] (simile); food for camels [[Gen.24.25|Gen 24:25]]; [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), asses [[Judg.19.19|Judg 19:19]] (all + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִסְפּוֺא‎</span>), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בָּקָר‎</span> [[Isa.11.7|Isa 11:7]]; [[Isa.65.25|Isa 65:25]], horses [[1Kgs.5.8|1Kgs 5:8]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שְׂעֹרִים‎</span>); mixed with clay in brick-making [[Exod.5.7|Exod 5:7]] (twice in verse); [[Exod.5.10|Exod 5:10]]; [[Exod.5.11|Exod 5:11]]; [[Exod.5.12|Exod 5:12]] (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קַשׂ‎</span>), v[[Exod.5.13|Exod 5:13]] v[[Exod.5.16|Exod 5:16]] v[[Exod.5.18|Exod 5:18]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); — see further [[BDB#Vogelst|Vogelst]]<sup>Landwirthsch. 67</sup>.
